items.content_html: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and even share them with others.
items.title: kunalcoder45/Cravid: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and even share them with others.
